doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 28
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 28
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."

2. Footage from CSPAN of US House of Representatives voting on a bill to define marriage and allow states not to recognize same-sex marriage. Includes footage of Martin Meehan, Democratic Representative from Massachusetts; Tom DeLay, Republican Representative from Texas/Republican Whip; Sam Gejdenson, Democratic Representative from Connecticut; George Gekas, Republican Representative from Pennsylvania; and David Funderburk, Republican Representative from North Carolina.
COMMERCIAL: "Support Human Rights for Lesbian and Gay People", sponsored by Professionals in Film/Video. Includes Cathay Che of GLAAD.

3. Additional footage from CSPAN of US House of Representatives voting on a bill to define marriage and allow states not to recognize same-sex marriage. Includes footage of Charles Canady, Republican Representative from Florida; Wayne Gilchrest, Republican Representative from Maryland; Bob Barr, Republican Representative from Georgia; Cliff Stearns, Republican Representative from Florida; Robert Dornan, Republican Representative from California; Ron Lewis, Republican Representative from Kentucky; Neil Abercrombie, Democratic Representative from Hawaii; and Ed Bryant, Republican Representative from Tennessee.
COMMERCIAL: National Association of People with AIDS, "Don't wait. Take the test for HIV. Take control."
4. Footage of California AIDS Ride 3. Includes footage of San Francisco Mayor Willie Brown; Judith Light, [actress]; and Daniel Pallotta, creator of AIDS Ride 3.
5. Footage of Bastille Day, celebrated with Restaurant Florent. Includes footage of Lou Maletta interviewing Florent Morellet, Grande Hostess.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."

6. "Lambda Update": Kevin Cathcart, Executive Director of the Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, introduces Lou Maletta's interview with Beatrice Dohrn, Lambda Legal Director, regarding the gay community's victory in the Colorado Amendment 2 case.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Academy for State and Local Government, "Be a hero to a child in your community"
7. Lou Maletta interviews Brad Gooch, author, regarding his book "The Golden Age of Promiscuity".
8. Lou Maletta discusses the material covered in this episode.
